name: JBoss BPM Suite and Signavio Demo
summary: The example project mortgage demo that is delivered with the JBoss BPM product, features BPM with task integration, rule integration, web service with exception handling, and multiple swimlanes for task assignments. Install options - local, OpenShift and Docker.
author: Babak Mozaffari, Andrew Block, Eric D. Schabell
technologies: JBoss BPM Suite, Signavio Process Editor
